text:
Emil Karewicz (13 March 1923 – 18 March 2020) was a Polish actor. He was born in Wilno, Poland. His career lasted from 1948 until his retirement in 2015. He was best known for his role as SS-Sturmbannführer Hermann Brunner in TV Series "Stawka większa niż życie". Karewicz also starred as SS-Obersturmführer in the movies "How I Unleashed World War II" and King Władysław II Jagiełło in "Knights of the Teutonic Order".
Karewicz died on 18 March 2020 at the age of 97.

annotations.surface_form: How I Unleashed World War II
